title: An Act to establish the Massachusetts loan loss guarantee program for community development financial institutions

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Oliveira, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 815) of Jacob R. Oliveira for legislation to establish the Massachusetts loan loss guarantee program for community development financial institutions.  Financial Services.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Financial Services
